info.title: GEO Airports API
info.description: Fetch detailed information on 9000+ airports worldwide using their IATA codes. Quickly find the nearest airport to any location by providing latitude and longitude coordinates. Perfect for travel apps, logistics, and location-based services.

get.summary: Get airport information by IATA code
get.description: Fetch detailed information about an airport using its unique IATA code. Returns airport name, location coordinates, country, continent, city, and website.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The 3-character IATA airport code (uppercase), e.g.: LHR, JFK

get.summary: Find the nearest airport to a location
get.description: Identify the nearest airport to a specified geographic coordinate using latitude and longitude. Uses the Haversine formula to calculate distance in kilometers.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate in decimal degrees, e.g.: 40.531

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate in decimal degrees, e.g.: -2.142
